verbs.description: Melania Trump [V: will] not accompany President Trump to the G7 summit in Canada on Friday or to his historic summit in Singapore on June 12 , as Sunday marks 24 days since she 's been seen .

[ARG0: Melania Trump] [ARGM-MOD: will] [ARGM-NEG: not] [V: accompany] [ARG1: President Trump] [ARG2: to the G7 summit in Canada] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] or to his historic summit in Singapore on June 12 , [ARGM-TMP: as Sunday marks 24 days since she 's been seen] .

Melania Trump will not accompany President Trump to the G7 summit in Canada on Friday or to his historic summit in Singapore on June 12 , as [ARG0: Sunday] [V: marks] [ARG1: 24 days since she 's been seen] .
